page.title: 10Playground Games, Enfield
page.content: The most popular games we play in the playground are football, handstands, skipping, leapfrog & block. These were played by our parents & grandparents.{ Block is a game where you have to reach a post without being caught. One person is "It" & has to count up to 100 with their eyes closed. Meanwhile everyone has to hide. Soon the person who is "It" turns round. The people who are hiding now have to get back to the post without being pointed at & caught. If you are the first caught you will be "It" next unless someone frees you by saying "Release the lock". Our parents called this by different names such as Lucky, Hideout & Tin Can Tommy. Some playground games have died out, e.g. Whip & Top, Hopscotch & Kiss Chase, this is banned here. Seasonal games we play are conkers, sliding & snowballs.
